content.value: This post demonstrates how you can now interleave text and images in any order. For example, here is some introductory text followed by a single image.
And here is some more text that follows the image. Next, we can have a grid of multiple photos.
Finally, we can end with some concluding thoughts or bullet points.

items: Flexibility to mix text and photos
